2000

Caroline Link

She was the second woman to

win an Academy Award

for International Feature Film

in 2003 for the German movie

Nowhere in Africa.

Susanne Bier

She was the third woman to win

an Academy Award for

International Feature Film

in 2011 for the Danish movie

In a Better World.

No other woman has received

this award in the last decade.

2021

Caroline Link

for International Feature Film

in 2003 for the German movie

Nowhere in Africa.

an Academy Award for

International Feature Film

this award in the last decade.

2021

Susanne Bier

She was the third woman to win an Academy

Award for International Feature Film in 2011

for the Danish movie In a Better World.

No other woman has received

this award in the last decade.

Caroline Link

She was the second woman to win an Academy Award

for International Feature Film in 2003 for the German movie

Nowhere in Africa. Before this, Dutch director Marleen Gorris

was the only woman who had previously received this award.

2021

Susanne Bier

She was the third woman to win an Academy Award

for International Feature Film in 2011 for the Danish

movie In a Better World. No other woman has received

this award in the last decade.
